name: Mojon Twins' Covertape 2
description:
Like a mixtape for games, Mojon Twins' Covertape 2 is a collection of eleven games and one demo by the Spanish group Mojon Twins. It is the successor to the first covertape the year before. Some of these titles are spin-offs of existing games, would later be turned into full or reworked games or are entirely new even though they are already linked below.

Side A:
  • Bootee
  • D'Veel'Ng
  • Jet Paco
  • Julifrustris in the City
  • Lala Lah
  • Sir Ababol II: The Ice Palace (demo)
Side B:
  • BALOWWWN!
  • Dogmole Tuppowski Vs. the Mesmerizing Meemaid from Miskatonic
  • El Vampiro Ramiro en el Bosque del Suspiro
  • Mega Meghan
  • Monono
  • Viaje al centro de la napia (Journey to the Centre of the Nose)
All games included on this covertape, except for the demo of Sir Ababol II: The Ice Palace and the extra version of Ramiro el Vampiro, use a special, new version 3.99b of the developer's The Churrera engine. As they were working on a tutorial for it, they cleaned up the engine and used the games on this covertape to test the changes and different parts of the engine.
